AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spiderling Cannibal
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME devoured all of HIS siblings, feasting on their bodies before building HIS first web.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cocooned Early
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME cocooned early, seeing very little of the world before beginning HIS molt. In HIS cocoon, HE dreamed.
